title: Hour 2 : NFC Novelties
description:
Stephen A. Smith, Michael Irvin, Ryan Clark, and Kendrick Perkins discuss the rise and fall of quarterbacks within the NFC, playmaker's top playmakers, and Russell Westbrooks standing with the Lakers.
